lead_paragraph: Royal Troon Golf Club is to hold a vote on admitting women members before next month's British Open at the Scottish course, it said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Troon to Vote on Women Members Before British Open
headline.main: Troon to Vote on Women Members Before British Open

snippet: Royal Troon Golf Club is to hold a vote on admitting women members before next month's British Open at the Scottish course, it said on Wednesday....
